reference.title: Install Application dialog
reference.shortdesc: Installs an application to an Android device or a running emulator instance. This dialog is presented when you right-click a device in the Device Management view and select Install App from the menu that appears.

strow.stentry: Path to the application package (.apk file) to be installed. This file can usually be found inside the project's bin directory.

This option, which is selected by default, allows an existing version of the application to be overwritten on the target device. Clear this option if you don't want to overwrite any existing version of the application.
